Package jGame.core.ui.hud

Class UIHudCheckBoxElement

java.lang.Object
jGame.core.ui.hud.UIHudElement
jGame.core.ui.hud.UIHudButtonElement
jGame.core.ui.hud.UIHudCheckBoxElement
public class UIHudCheckBoxElement
extends UIHudButtonElement
Class representing a toggable checkbox.
Since:
1.1.0
Author:
Nuno Pereira

    • UIHudCheckBoxElement

      public UIHudCheckBoxElement()

    • UIHudCheckBoxElement

      public UIHudCheckBoxElement​(int x, int y, int sideLength)
      Creates a new check box element in the given position and with the given side length (meant to be a square).
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal position of this element
      y - the vertical position of this element
      sideLength - the size of the element's sides
      Since:
      1.1.0

    • UIHudCheckBoxElement

      public UIHudCheckBoxElement​(int x, int y, int sideLength, java.lang.String text)
      Creates a new check box element in the given position and with the given side length (meant to be a square). Also sets the text to be displayed on the side of this checkbox.
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal position of this element
      y - the vertical position of this element
      sideLength - the size of the element's sides
      text - the text to be displayed
      Since:
      1.1.0

    • UIHudCheckBoxElement

      public UIHudCheckBoxElement​(int x, int y, int sideLength, boolean checked)
      Creates a new check box element in the given position and with the given side length (meant to be a square).
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal position of this element
      y - the vertical position of this element
      sideLength - the size of the element's sides
      checked - weather this check box is already on or not
      Since:
      1.1.0

    • UIHudCheckBoxElement

      public UIHudCheckBoxElement​(int x, int y, int sideLength, java.lang.String text, boolean checked)
      Creates a new check box element in the given position and with the given side length (meant to be a square). Also sets the text to be displayed on the side of this checkbox.
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal position of this element
      y - the vertical position of this element
      sideLength - the size of the element's sides
      text - the text to be displayed
      checked - weather this check box is on or not

    • UIHudCheckBoxElement

      public UIHudCheckBoxElement​(int x, int y, int sideLength, int constraintType, int[] constraintValues)
      Creates a new check box element in the given position and with the given side length (meant to be a square).
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal position of this element
      y - the vertical position of this element
      sideLength - the size of the element's sides
      constraintType - the constraints to apply to this element
      constraintValues - the specific values to apply when constraining the element
      Since:
      1.1.0

    • UIHudCheckBoxElement

      x - the horizontal position of this element
      y - the vertical position of this element
      sideLength - the size of the element's sides

    • UIHudCheckBoxElement

      public UIHudCheckBoxElement​(int x, int y, int sideLength, java.lang.String text, boolean checked, int constraintType, int[] constraintValues)
      Creates a new check box element in the given position and with the given side length (meant to be a square). Also sets the text to be displayed on the side of this checkbox.
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal position of this element
      y - the vertical position of this element
      sideLength - the size of the element's sides
      text - the text to be displayed
      checked - weather this check box is on or not
      constraintType - the constraints to apply to this element
      constraintValues - the specific values to apply when constraining the element
      Since:
      1.1.0
